settings.title: Materials
settings.content: At Awareness Avenue, our lab grown diamond rings are crafted with utmost care using only the finest materials. Each ring is available in 10K, 14K, or 18K gold—whether white, rose, or yellow—ensuring a perfect blend of luxury and durability. Featuring D color, VS1 clarity lab grown diamonds, our rings are designed to maximize brilliance while remaining completely skin-safe and hypoallergenic. Enjoy a timeless piece that retains its beauty day after day, all backed by our lifetime guarantee on manufacturer defects.

settings.title: Size & Fit
settings.content:
All our rings are made true to U.S. standard ring sizes.

Our rings are crafted to U.S. standard ring sizes, available in an extensive range from size 3 to 15—including half sizes—to ensure the perfect fit.

If you don't see your size, please contact us for a custom order.

Unsure of your ring size? We offer straightforward returns and exchanges, plus a one-time complimentary resizing service for your convenience up to $50 USD value.

settings.title: Find Your Ring Size
settings.content:
Finding Your Ring Size.

  1. Cut a strip of paper or a piece of string. Wrap the paper or string around the finger to be sized. 
  2. Slide the paper or string up to the knuckle, as the ring must be sized large enough to able to slip off and on, over the knuckle.
  3. Mark the intersection point of string. Make sure to mark both points of the string.
  4. Place the paper or string next to a ruler and write down your measurement.

  5. Locate your ring size by locating your measurement on the size chart.

If the measurement falls in between two sizes, it is recommended that you choose the larger size. Your fingers might also swell if you're pregnant or taking certain medications. Take this into account when measuring your fingers

Finding the Ring Size for Your Loved Ones.

  1. Find a ring that your loved one currently wears.
  2. Make sure he or she wears that ring on the finger you are shopping for.
  3. Using a ruler to measure the inside diameter or inside circumference of the ring.
  4. Match your measurement with our size chart to find your perfect fitting size!

If the measurement falls in between two sizes, it is recommended that you choose the larger size.

GUIDE FULL HERE.

settings.title: Lifetime Warranty
settings.content:
We stand behind the quality and craftsmanship of our jewelry with our lifetime warranty.

What does that mean? That means if for any reason your jewelry does not meet quality expectations as a result of manufacturing defects; we will replace it for free - we won't even ask you to return the defective piece.

Our promise of "Ethical Jewelry, Guaranteed for Life" means every piece is crafted to be a lasting symbol of beauty and integrity.

We want you to feel confident that your jewelry will remain as stunning as the day you first wore it, now and for years to come.

settings.title: Conflict Free
settings.content:
At Awareness Avenue, we’re dedicated to providing jewelry you can trust. Our lab grown diamond rings feature conflict-free stones with D color and VS1 clarity, carefully cut to maximize brilliance.

Each ring is crafted using ethically sourced materials that are skin-safe and built to last without fading or discoloration.

We back our commitment to responsible production with GRA certification for eligible pieces, along with a lifetime guarantee on manufacturer defects, so you can wear your ring with confidence every day.
